subject: Discovery call with Sarah Johnson
description: Discussed their current tech stack and pain points. They're looking for a comprehensive solution that can handle their enterprise-level requirements. Very interested in our scalability features.

subject: Proposal sent to TechCorp
description: Sent detailed proposal including technical specifications, pricing, and implementation timeline. Included case studies from similar enterprise clients.

subject: Technical demo with Innovate Labs
description: Conducted 90-minute technical demonstration focusing on API integration capabilities. Michael was impressed with the platform's flexibility and development tools.

subject: Follow-up with Emily Rodriguez
description: Discussed marketing automation features and pricing options. She's particularly interested in the campaign analytics and A/B testing capabilities.

subject: Research on Startup Ventures
description: Completed background research on the company. They recently raised $2M in Series A funding and are looking to scale their operations rapidly. Budget constraints but high growth potential.

subject: Contract signed - Retail Plus
description: Received signed contract from Lisa Thompson. Implementation team has been notified and project kickoff scheduled for February 1st.

subject: Initial contact with David Kim
description: Cold outreach call went well. David is interested in learning more about how our platform can help them scale their fintech operations. Scheduled demo for next week.

subject: Quarterly business review with TechCorp
description: Discussed their upcoming expansion plans and how our solution can support their growth. Identified additional opportunities for upselling premium features.
